title: That’s Life
lyrics:
[intro, ternary strum] (C)  (Am)  (D7)  (G)
 
That's life (C) (that's life)
That's what (E7)all the people say
(Am) You're ridin' high in April
(D7) Shot down in May
But (C)I know I'm gonna (E7)change that (Am)tune
When I'm (D7)back on top, back on top in (G)June
 
I said that's life (C) (that's life)
And as (E7)funny as it may seem
(Am) Some people get their kicks
(D7) Stompin' on a dream
But (C)I don't let it, (E7) let it get me (Am)down
'Cause this (D7)fine old world, (G) it keeps spinnin' (C) around
 
I've been a (C)puppet, a pauper, a pirate, a poet, a… (C7) pawn and a king
I've been (F)up and down and over and out and (F7) I know one thing
(D7)Each time I find myself flat on my face
[single strums]
I (G)pick myself (G)up and get (G)back (G)in (G)the (G)race
 
That's life (C) (that's life) I tell you (E7) I can't deny it
(Am) I thought of quitting, baby
But my (D7)heart just ain't gonna buy it
And (C)if I didn't think it was (E7)worth one single (Am)try
I'd jump (D7)right on a big bird (G) and then I'd (C)fly
 
I've been a (C)puppet, a pauper, a pirate, a poet, a... (C7) pawn and a king
I've been (F)up and down and over and out and (F7) I know one thing
(D7)Each time I find myself flat on my face
[single strums - ready to transpose?]
I (G)pick myself (G)up and get (Ab)back (Ab)in (Ab)the (Ab)race
 
That's life (Db) (that's life) that's life (F7) and I can't deny it
(Bbm) Many times I thought of cuttin' out... but (Eb7)my heart won't buy it
But (Db)if there's nothin' shakin' (F7) come this here (Bbm)July (Bbm-stop)
[single strums] I'm gonna (Eb7)roll myself up in a (Ab)big ball a-a-and
[normal strum - slow down] (Db)Die (E7)  (A)  (Am) My, (Db)my! [end]
